00057 #ifndef NULL
00058         #define NULL 0

00065 class KviPointerListNode
00066 {
00067 public:
00068         KviPointerListNode * m_pPrev;
00069         void               * m_pData;
00070         KviPointerListNode * m_pNext;
00071 };

00143 template<typename T> class KviPointerListIterator
00144 {
00145 protected:
00146         KviPointerList<T>                 * m_pList;
00147         KviPointerListNode                * m_pNode;
00148 public:
00156         KviPointerListIterator(const KviPointerListIterator<T> & src)
00157         {
00158                 m_pList = src.m_pList;
00159                 m_pNode = src.m_pNode;
00160         }
00161 
00169         KviPointerListIterator(KviPointerList<T> & l)
00170         {
00171                 m_pList = (KviPointerList<T> *)&l;
00172                 m_pNode = m_pList->m_pHead;
00173         }
00174 
00183         KviPointerListIterator(KviPointerList<T> & l,KviPointerListNode * pNode)
00184         {
00185                 m_pList = (KviPointerList<T> *)&l;
00186                 m_pNode = pNode;
00187         }
00188 
00196         void operator = (const KviPointerListIterator<T> & src)
00197         {
00198                 m_pList = src.m_pList;
00199                 m_pNode = src.m_pNode;
00200         }
00201 public:
00208         bool moveFirst()
00209         {
00210                 m_pNode = m_pList->m_pHead;
00211                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00212         }
00213 
00220         bool moveLast()
00221         {
00222                 m_pNode = m_pList->m_pTail;
00223                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00224         }
00225 
00233         bool moveNext()
00234         {
00235                 if(!m_pNode)return false;
00236                 m_pNode = m_pNode->m_pNext;
00237                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00238         }
00239 
00248         bool operator ++()
00249         {
00250                 if(!m_pNode)return false;
00251                 m_pNode = m_pNode->m_pNext;
00252                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00253         }
00254 
00263         bool movePrev()
00264         {
00265                 if(!m_pNode)return false;
00266                 m_pNode = m_pNode->m_pPrev;
00267                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00268         }
00269 
00279         bool operator --()
00280         {
00281                 if(!m_pNode)return false;
00282                 m_pNode = m_pNode->m_pPrev;
00283                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00284         }
00285 
00292         T * current()
00293         {
00294                 return m_pNode ? (T *)(m_pNode->m_pData) : NULL;
00295         }
00296 
00304         T * operator *()
00305         {
00306                 return m_pNode ? (T *)(m_pNode->m_pData) : NULL;
00307         }
00308 
00315         bool isValid()
00316         {
00317                 return m_pNode != NULL;
00318         }

00365 template<typename T> class KviPointerList
00366 {
00367         friend class KviPointerListIterator<T>;
00368 protected:
00369         bool   m_bAutoDelete;   //< do we automatically delete items when they are removed ?
00370 
00371         KviPointerListNode * m_pHead;         //< our list head pointer (NULL if there are no items in the list)
00372         KviPointerListNode * m_pTail;         //< our list tail
00373         KviPointerListNode * m_pAux;          //< our iteration pointer
00374 
00375         unsigned int m_uCount;  //< the count of items in the list
00376 protected:
00387         void insertBeforeSafe(KviPointerListNode * ref, const T * d)
00388         {
00389                 m_pAux = ref;
00390                 KviPointerListNode * n = new KviPointerListNode;
00391                 n->m_pPrev = m_pAux->m_pPrev;
00392                 n->m_pNext = m_pAux;
00393                 if(m_pAux->m_pPrev)
00394                 {
00395                         m_pAux->m_pPrev->m_pNext = n;
00396                 } else {
00397                         m_pHead = n;
00398                 }
00399                 m_pAux->m_pPrev = n;
00400                 n->m_pData = (void *)d;
00401                 m_uCount++;
00402         }
00403 
00409         void grabFirstAndPrepend(KviPointerList<T> * src)
00410         {
00411                 KviPointerListNode * pNewHead = src->m_pHead;
00412                 if(!pNewHead)
00413                         return;
00414 
00415                 if(pNewHead->m_pNext)
00416                 {
00417                         src->m_pHead = pNewHead->m_pNext;
00418                         src->m_pHead->m_pPrev = NULL;
00419                 } else {
00420                         src->m_pHead = NULL;
00421                         src->m_pTail = NULL;
00422                 }
00423 
00424                 if(m_pHead)
00425                 {
00426                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = pNewHead;
00427                         pNewHead->m_pNext = m_pHead;
00428                         m_pHead = pNewHead;
00429                 } else {
00430                         m_pHead = pNewHead;
00431                         m_pTail = pNewHead;
00432                         m_pHead->m_pNext = NULL;
00433                 }
00434                 m_uCount++;
00435                 src->m_uCount--;
00436         }
00437 
00442         void removeCurrentSafe()
00443         {
00444                 if(m_pAux->m_pPrev)
00445                         m_pAux->m_pPrev->m_pNext = m_pAux->m_pNext;
00446                 else
00447                         m_pHead = m_pAux->m_pNext;
00448                 if(m_pAux->m_pNext)
00449                         m_pAux->m_pNext->m_pPrev = m_pAux->m_pPrev;
00450                 else
00451                         m_pTail = m_pAux->m_pPrev;
00452                 const T * pAuxData = (const T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00453                 delete m_pAux;
00454                 m_pAux = NULL;
00455                 m_uCount--;
00456                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
00457                         delete pAuxData; // this can cause recursion, so do it at the end
00458         }
00459 
00460 public:
00469         void merge(KviPointerList<T> * src)
00470         {
00471                 m_pAux = m_pHead;
00472                 KviPointerListNode * n = src->m_pHead;
00473                 m_uCount += src->m_uCount;
00474                 while(m_pAux && n)
00475                 {
00476                         if(kvi_compare((const T *)(m_pAux->m_pData),(const T *)(n->m_pData)) > 0)
00477                         {
00478                                 // our element is greater, n->m_pData goes first
00479                                 KviPointerListNode * pNext = n->m_pNext;
00480                                 n->m_pPrev = m_pAux->m_pPrev; // his prev becomes
00481                                 n->m_pNext = m_pAux;
00482                                 if(m_pAux->m_pPrev)
00483                                         m_pAux->m_pPrev->m_pNext = n;
00484                                 else
00485                                         m_pHead = n;
00486                                 m_pAux->m_pPrev = n;
00487                                 n = pNext;
00488                         } else {
00489                                 // that element is greater
00490                                 m_pAux = m_pAux->m_pNext;
00491                         }
00492                 }
00493                 if(n)
00494                 {
00495                         // last items to append
00496                         if(m_pTail)
00497                         {
00498                                 m_pTail->m_pNext = n;
00499                                 n->m_pPrev = m_pTail;
00500                         } else {
00501                                 m_pHead = n;
00502                                 m_pTail = n;
00503                                 n->m_pPrev = NULL;
00504                         }
00505                         m_pTail = src->m_pTail;
00506                 }
00507 
00508                 src->m_pHead = NULL;
00509                 src->m_pTail = NULL;
00510                 src->m_uCount = 0;
00511         }
00512 
00518         void swap(KviPointerList<T> * src)
00519         {
00520                 KviPointerListNode * n = m_pHead;
00521                 m_pHead = src->m_pHead;
00522                 src->m_pHead = n;
00523                 n = m_pTail;
00524                 m_pTail = src->m_pTail;
00525                 src->m_pTail = n;
00526                 unsigned int uCount = m_uCount;
00527                 m_uCount = src->m_uCount;
00528                 src->m_uCount = uCount;
00529         }
00530 
00531 
00541         void sort()
00542         {
00543                 if(m_uCount < 2)return;
00544 
00545                 KviPointerList<T> carry;
00546                 KviPointerList<T> tmp[64];
00547                 KviPointerList * fill = &tmp[0];
00548                 KviPointerList * counter;
00549 
00550                 do {
00551                         carry.grabFirstAndPrepend(this);
00552 
00553                         for(counter = &tmp[0];counter != fill && !counter->isEmpty();++counter)
00554                         {
00555                                 counter->merge(&carry);
00556                                 carry.swap(counter);
00557                         }
00558                         carry.swap(counter);
00559                         if(counter == fill)
00560                                 ++fill;
00561                 } while(m_uCount > 0);
00562 
00563                 for(counter = &tmp[1];counter != fill;++counter)
00564                         counter->merge(counter-1);
00565                 swap(fill-1);
00566         }
00567 
00579         void inSort(T * t)
00580         {
00581                 KviPointerListNode * x = m_pHead;
00582                 while(x && (kvi_compare(((T *)x->m_pData),t) > 0))x = x->m_pNext;
00583                 if(!x)append(t);
00584                 else insertBeforeSafe(x,t);
00585         }
00586 
00591         bool isEmpty() const
00592         {
00593                 return (m_pHead == NULL);
00594         }
00595 
00600         unsigned int count() const
00601         {
00602                 return m_uCount;
00603         }
00604 
00612         T * first()
00613         {
00614                 if(!m_pHead)
00615                 {
00616                         m_pAux = NULL;
00617                         return NULL;
00618                 }
00619                 m_pAux = m_pHead;
00620                 return (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00621         }
00622 
00630         T * takeFirst()
00631         {
00632                 if(!m_pHead)
00633                         return NULL;
00634                 T * pData = (T *)m_pHead->m_pData;
00635                 if(m_pHead->m_pNext)
00636                 {
00637                         m_pHead = m_pHead->m_pNext;
00638                         delete m_pHead->m_pPrev;
00639                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = NULL;
00640                 } else {
00641                         delete m_pHead;
00642                         m_pHead = NULL;
00643                         m_pTail = NULL;
00644                 }
00645                 m_pAux = NULL;
00646                 m_uCount--;
00647                 return pData;
00648         }
00649 
00650 
00655         T * takeLast()
00656         {
00657                 if(!m_pTail)
00658                         return NULL;
00659                 T * pData = (T *)m_pTail->m_pData;
00660                 if(m_pTail->m_pPrev)
00661                 {
00662                         m_pTail = m_pTail->m_pPrev;
00663                         delete m_pTail->m_pNext;
00664                         m_pTail->m_pNext = NULL;
00665                 } else {
00666                         delete m_pTail;
00667                         m_pHead = NULL;
00668                         m_pTail = NULL;
00669                 }
00670                 m_pAux = NULL;
00671                 m_uCount--;
00672                 return pData;
00673         }
00674 
00679         KviPointerListIterator<T> iteratorAtFirst()
00680         {
00681                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,m_pHead);
00682         }
00683 
00691         T * last()
00692         {
00693                 if(!m_pTail)
00694                 {
00695                         m_pAux = NULL;
00696                         return NULL;
00697                 }
00698                 m_pAux = m_pTail;
00699                 return (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00700         }
00701 
00706         KviPointerListIterator<T> iteratorAtLast()
00707         {
00708                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,m_pTail);
00709         }
00710 
00718         T * current()
00719         {
00720                 return (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00721         }
00722 
00732         T * safeCurrent()
00733         {
00734                 return m_pAux ? (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData) : NULL;
00735         }
00736 
00744         KviPointerListIterator<T> iteratorAtCurrent()
00745         {
00746                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,m_pAux);
00747         }
00748 
00758         T * next()
00759         {
00760                 if(!m_pAux)return NULL;
00761                 m_pAux = m_pAux->m_pNext;
00762                 if(m_pAux)return (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00763                 return NULL;
00764         }
00765 
00776         T * prev()
00777         {
00778                 if(!m_pAux)return NULL;
00779                 m_pAux = m_pAux->m_pPrev;
00780                 if(m_pAux)return (T *)(m_pAux->m_pData);
00781                 return NULL;
00782         }
00783 
00792         T * at(int idx)
00793         {
00794                 T * t = first();
00795                 int cnt = 0;
00796                 while(t)
00797                 {
00798                         if(idx == cnt)return t;
00799                         t = next();
00800                         cnt++;
00801                 }
00802                 return 0;
00803         }
00804 
00810         KviPointerListIterator<T> iteratorAt(int idx)
00811         {
00812                 KviPointerListNode * n = m_pHead;
00813                 int cnt = 0;
00814                 while(n)
00815                 {
00816                         if(idx == cnt)
00817                                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,n);
00818                         n = n->m_pNext;
00819                         cnt++;
00820                 }
00821                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,NULL);
00822         }
00823 
00833         int findRef(const T * d)
00834         {
00835                 int ret = 0;
00836                 for(T * t = first();t;t = next())
00837                 {
00838                         if(t == d)return ret;
00839                         ret++;
00840                 }
00841                 return -1;
00842         }
00843 
00849         KviPointerListIterator<T> iteratorAtRef(const T * d)
00850         {
00851                 KviPointerListNode * n = m_pHead;
00852                 while(n)
00853                 {
00854                         if(n->m_pData == d)
00855                                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,n);
00856                         n = n->m_pNext;
00857                 }
00858                 return KviPointerListIterator<T>(*this,NULL);
00859         }
00860 
00866         void append(const T * d)
00867         {
00868                 if(!m_pHead)
00869                 {
00870                         m_pHead = new KviPointerListNode;
00871                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = NULL;
00872                         m_pHead->m_pNext = NULL;
00873                         m_pHead->m_pData = (void *)d;
00874                         m_pTail = m_pHead;
00875                 } else {
00876                         m_pTail->m_pNext = new KviPointerListNode;
00877                         m_pTail->m_pNext->m_pPrev = m_pTail;
00878                         m_pTail->m_pNext->m_pNext = NULL;
00879                         m_pTail->m_pNext->m_pData = (void *)d;
00880                         m_pTail = m_pTail->m_pNext;
00881                 }
00882                 m_uCount++;
00883         }
00884 
00890         void append(KviPointerList<T> * l)
00891         {
00892                 for(T * t = l->first();t;t = l->next())append(t);
00893         }
00894 
00900         void prepend(KviPointerList<T> * l)
00901         {
00902                 for(T * t = l->last();t;t = l->prev())prepend(t);
00903         }
00904 
00910         void prepend(const T * d)
00911         {
00912                 if(!m_pHead)
00913                 {
00914                         m_pHead = new KviPointerListNode;
00915                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = NULL;
00916                         m_pHead->m_pNext = NULL;
00917                         m_pHead->m_pData = (void *)d;
00918                         m_pTail = m_pHead;
00919                 } else {
00920                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = new KviPointerListNode;
00921                         m_pHead->m_pPrev->m_pNext = m_pHead;
00922                         m_pHead->m_pPrev->m_pPrev = NULL;
00923                         m_pHead->m_pPrev->m_pData = (void *)d;
00924                         m_pHead =  m_pHead->m_pPrev;
00925                         m_uCount++;
00926                 }
00927         }
00928 
00941         void insert(int iIndex, const T * d)
00942         {
00943                 m_pAux = m_pHead;
00944                 while(m_pAux && iIndex > 0)
00945                 {
00946                         iIndex--;
00947                         m_pAux = m_pAux->m_pNext;
00948                 }
00949                 if(m_pAux)
00950                         insertBeforeSafe(m_pAux,d);
00951                 else
00952                         append(d);
00953         }
00954 
00961         bool removeFirst()
00962         {
00963                 if(!m_pHead)return false;
00964                 const T * pAuxData;
00965                 if(m_pHead->m_pNext)
00966                 {
00967                         m_pHead = m_pHead->m_pNext;
00968                         pAuxData = (const T *)(m_pHead->m_pPrev->m_pData);
00969                         delete m_pHead->m_pPrev;
00970                         m_pHead->m_pPrev = NULL;
00971                 } else {
00972                         pAuxData = (const T *)(m_pHead->m_pData);
00973                         delete m_pHead;
00974                         m_pHead = NULL;
00975                         m_pTail = NULL;
00976                 }
00977                 m_pAux = NULL;
00978                 m_uCount--;
00979                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
00980                         delete pAuxData;
00981                 return true;
00982         }
00983 
00990         bool removeLast()
00991         {
00992                 if(!m_pTail)return false;
00993                 const T * pAuxData;
00994                 if(m_pTail->m_pPrev)
00995                 {
00996                         m_pTail = m_pTail->m_pPrev;
00997                         pAuxData = (const T *)(m_pTail->m_pNext->m_pData);
00998                         delete m_pTail->m_pNext;
00999                         m_pTail->m_pNext = NULL;
01000                 } else {
01001                         pAuxData = (const T *)(m_pTail->m_pData);
01002                         delete m_pTail;
01003                         m_pHead = NULL;
01004                         m_pTail = NULL;
01005                 }
01006                 m_pAux = NULL;
01007                 m_uCount--;
01008                 if(m_bAutoDelete)
01009                         delete pAuxData;
01010                 return true;
01011         }
01012 
01021         bool remove(int iIndex)
01022         {
01023                 m_pAux = m_pHead;
01024                 while(m_pAux && iIndex > 0)
01025                 {
01026                         iIndex--;
01027                         m_pAux = m_pAux->m_pNext;
01028                 }
01029                 if(!m_pAux)
01030                         return false;
01031                 removeCurrentSafe();
01032                 return true;
01033         }
01034 
01044         void setAutoDelete(bool bAutoDelete)
01045         {
01046                 m_bAutoDelete = bAutoDelete;
01047         }
01048 
01053         bool autoDelete()
01054         {
01055                 return m_bAutoDelete;
01056         };
01057 
01064         void clear()
01065         {
01066                 while(m_pHead)removeFirst();
01067         }
01068 
01076         bool removeCurrent()
01077         {
01078                 if(!m_pAux)
01079                         return false;
01080                 removeCurrentSafe();
01081                 return true;
01082         }
01083 
01092         bool removeRef(const T * d)
01093         {
01094                 if(findRef(d) == -1)return false;
01095                 removeCurrentSafe();
01096                 return true;
01097         }
01098 
01109         void insertAfter(const T * ref, const T * d)
01110         {
01111                 if(findRef(ref) == -1)
01112                 {
01113                         append(d);
01114                         return;
01115                 }
01116                 KviPointerListNode * n = new KviPointerListNode;
01117                 n->m_pPrev = m_pAux;
01118                 n->m_pNext = m_pAux->m_pNext;
01119                 if(m_pAux->m_pNext)
01120                         m_pAux->m_pNext->m_pPrev = n;
01121                 else
01122                         m_pTail = n;
01123                 m_pAux->m_pNext = n;
01124                 n->m_pData = (void *)d;
01125                 m_uCount++;
01126         }
01127 
01139         void insertBefore(const T * ref, const T * d)
01140         {
01141                 if(findRef(ref) == -1)
01142                 {
01143                         prepend(d);
01144                         return;
01145                 }
01146                 KviPointerListNode * n = new KviPointerListNode;
01147                 n->m_pPrev = m_pAux->m_pPrev;
01148                 n->m_pNext = m_pAux;
01149                 if(m_pAux->m_pPrev)
01150                         m_pAux->m_pPrev->m_pNext = n;
01151                 else
01152                         m_pHead = n;
01153                 m_pAux->m_pPrev = n;
01154                 n->m_pData = (void *)d;
01155                 m_uCount++;
01156         }
01157 
01162         void invert()
01163         {
01164                 if(!m_pHead)return;
01165                 KviPointerListNode * oldHead = m_pHead;
01166                 KviPointerListNode * oldTail = m_pTail;
01167                 KviPointerListNode * n = m_pHead;
01168                 while(n)
01169                 {
01170                         KviPointerListNode * next = n->m_pNext;
01171                         n->m_pNext = n->m_pPrev;
01172                         n->m_pPrev = next;
01173                         n = next;
01174                 }
01175                 m_pTail = oldHead;
01176                 m_pHead = oldTail;
01177         }
01178 
01184         void copyFrom(KviPointerList<T> * l)
01185         {
01186                 clear();
01187                 for(T * t = l->first();t;t = l->next())append(t);
01188         }
01189 
01197         KviPointerList<T> & operator = (KviPointerList<T> & l)
01198         {
01199                 copyFrom(&l);
01200                 return *this;
01201         }
01202 
01208         KviPointerList<T>(bool bAutoDelete = true)
01209         {
01210                 m_bAutoDelete = bAutoDelete;
01211                 m_pHead = NULL;
01212                 m_pTail = NULL;
01213                 m_uCount = 0;
01214                 m_pAux  = NULL;
01215         };
01216 
01222         virtual ~KviPointerList<T>()
01223         {
01224                 clear();
01225         };
01226 };
01227 
01228 #define KviPointerListBase KviPointerList
